CustomField.description: This field is used in triggering alerts. The owner of account and created by keeps from email alerts being sent to Account owner when they created a quote for their account.
CustomField.formula: (Opportunity.Account.Focus_Account__c = true || Opportunity.Account.End_User_Focus__c ) && CreatedById != Opportunity.Account.OwnerId && CreatedDate > now()-180
CustomField.label: Focus Account
